name: Shiro LoRA | No Game No Life
description:
Original Repository on Huggingface: https://huggingface.co/Maisman/No-Game-NoLife-LoRAs
You can find more preview images on my Huggingface Page!

All Characters are over 18 years old, do not use for NSFW!

ALL PREVIEW IMAGES are made with following embeddings:
1. By bad artist -neg
2. easynegative

Anime Style: Prompt "ngnl style"
How to use:
Good weight ~0.5-0.6

High = Anime like (0.7-0.9)

Lower = Artwork like (0.5-0.6)

modelVersions.name: 2.0 Anime Style
modelVersions.description:
Shiro but now with her original Anime look! Just use
"ngnl style" in prompt to trigger her Anime style! I also added "ngnl background". This will try to add the feeling of the ngnl world and add its style too.

Improvements:

  • Better Anime look

  • She can now hold a chess piece (Okey sometimes but its better!)

  • Better enviroment

  • Better Shiro look. More detail

  • Better Backgrounds

Trigger Words same as before (version 1.0) + the new ones I mentioned.
